casebody.data:
Bartlett
v.
Barber 91P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Robert Andrew Bartlett, Sr., Pro Se.

Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, For Barber, David.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of March 2016 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
